document_data.name: In the Swirling Smoke of Abyss
document_data.author: Unknown
document_data.mainbody: '''''In the Swirling Smoke of Abyss''''' was a [[book]] written by an unknown author.
document_data.Contents: This book provided detailed accounts of [[demon]]s, their lords, and even their [[true name]]s.
document_data.Notable Owners: This book was in the possession of [[Gromph Baenre]] in [[1485 DR]].
